name: Nova Remote Assistance Tool
short_description: *Updated 6-11-2010 * Nova is a remote assistance tool developed in C# .NET 3.5. Using Nova, you can administrate remote computers through a File Explorer, Registry Editor, Process Manager, Live View, and Chat.
